citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:10 pm on
October 06, 2022. I asked for licensee at the ticket office. They called her and she said that she was not able to come to
the facility today.
Additional Inspectors:
ALICIA GRAVES, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:10 pm on 
October 06, 2022.  I asked for licensee at the ticket office.  They called her and she said that she was not able to come to 
the facility today.
